description: portrait bust of woman turned left looking out at viewer; wearing fur trimmed; hair in a partial updo with pearls around it; right hand on open book on table; in an oval
inscription:
Inscription

in plate around oval frame in black: ANNA MARIA A SCHUURMAN | below image in black four lines in Latin: Divini pictoris opus .../.../...cum decimaque nouem / m*4 | on sheet in pencil: 2-385
title: Portrait of Anna Maria A Schuurman
